articles.author: Arwa Mahdawi
articles.title: Depp comes up smelling of roses despite defamation trial's catalogue of misogyny - The Guardian
articles.description: The actor who joked about drowning and burning his then wife Amber Heard has been the toast of Cannes and has snagged $20m to hawk perfume
articles.content:
Heres Johnny! The king of Cannes and cologne
Johnny Depp seems to be on top of the world. Almost one year after he won a messy defamation lawsuit against his ex-wife, Amber Heard, the actors career … [+11410 chars]

articles.author: Sam Joseph Semon
articles.title: Sigourney Weaver dons a cream-colored jacket and matching pants during an after party in NYC - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Alien star, who recently joined the cast of the Apple Original Films project The Gorge, wore a cream-colored jacket and a matching pair of wide-legged pants during the premiere and after party.
articles.content:
Sigourney Weaver attended the after party for the premiere of Master Gardener, which took place in New York City on Friday evening.
The 73-year-old performer was the epitome of chic in a fashionable… [+3692 chars]

articles.title: Vin Diesel helps Ludacris' daughter SURPRISE him while receiving a star on Hollywood Walk of Fame - Daily Mail
articles.description: Vin Diesel helped Ludacris' oldest daughter, Karma, surprise the rapper  and his fellow Fast X cast mate as he received a star during the Hollywood Walk of Fame ceremony on Thursday.
articles.content:
Vin Diesel helped Ludacris' eldest daughter pull together a special surprise for her father as he received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on Thursday.
